title: Iteration
text: Use statements to repeatedly perform instructions in problem solving.

exercise.longest-sequence: Find the longest Collatz sequence for a starting number between 1 and 1000.
exercise.length-ratio: Find the starting number between 1 and 1,000,000 that has the smallest ratio between the number and collatz length.

section.title: Fizz Buzz
section.text: Print the numbers 1 to 100, but print "fizz" instead of multiples of 3 and "buzz" instead of multiples of 5.
